filmography.title: Pushover
filmography.role_description: A sultry gun moll who seduces a police detective into a scheme to steal bank robbery money; Novak's first major screen role.
filmography.plot: A police detective falls for the girlfriend of a bank robber he is staking out, leading him down a dark path of corruption and murder.

filmography.title: Phffft
filmography.role_description: A bubbly, scatterbrained playgirl who briefly dates a newly divorced man, played by Jack Lemmon.
filmography.plot: A divorced couple tries to navigate single life and dating, only to realize they may still be in love with each other.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Most Promising Newcomer

filmography.title: 5 Against the House
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who gets unwillingly dragged into a college heist plan by her boyfriend and his friends.
filmography.plot: Four college friends and a singer plan a daring robbery of a Reno casino, initially as a prank but turning serious.

filmography.title: The Man with the Golden Arm
filmography.role_description: A compassionate bar hostess and former flame who becomes the only source of support for a recovering heroin addict.
filmography.plot: A junkie must face his true self and his manipulative wife to kick his drug addiction and become a jazz drummer.

filmography.title: Picnic
filmography.role_description: A small-town beauty queen tired of being valued only for her looks, who falls for a rugged drifter.
filmography.plot: A drifter arrives in a small Kansas town on Labor Day and complicates the lives of his former college friend and the local women.

filmography.title: The Eddy Duchin Story
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who marries the famous pianist Eddy Duchin, but whose happiness is cut short by tragedy.
filmography.plot: The life story of the famous pianist and bandleader who captivated New York society in the 1930s.

filmography.title: Jeanne Eagels
filmography.role_description: The titular role in a biopic about the rise and fall of the famous 1920s stage actress who battled addiction.
filmography.plot: An ambitious carnival dancer rises to become a Broadway star, but her ruthless drive and substance abuse lead to her downfall.

filmography.title: Pal Joey
filmography.role_description: A naive chorus girl who becomes the object of affection for a womanizing singer, played by Frank Sinatra.
filmography.plot: A charming singer romances a wealthy widow to fund his own nightclub, but complicates things by falling for a chorus girl.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – World Film Favorite

filmography.title: Vertigo
filmography.role_description: A complex dual role as an icy blonde obsession and the earthy shopgirl who impersonated her; Novak's most iconic performance.
filmography.plot: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.
filmography.awards: Sight & Sound: Voted #1 Greatest Film of All Time (2012)

filmography.title: Bell, Book and Candle
filmography.role_description: A seductive witch living in Greenwich Village who casts a love spell on her neighbor, risking her magical powers.
filmography.plot: A modern-day witch casts a spell on her neighbor to make him fall in love with her, but risks losing her powers if she falls in love back.

filmography.title: Middle of the Night
filmography.role_description: A young, divorced receptionist who enters into a controversial romance with her much older, widowed boss.
filmography.plot: A 56-year-old widower falls for his 24-year-old receptionist/secretary, causing turmoil in both their families.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Nomination – Palme d'Or

filmography.title: Strangers When We Meet
filmography.role_description: A neglected suburban housewife who engages in a passionate, illicit affair with a married architect neighbor.
filmography.plot: Two married neighbors in a boring suburb begin an affair that threatens to destroy their families and their standing in the community.

filmography.title: Pepe
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself, helping the titular character buy a ring in a jewelry store.
filmography.plot: A Mexican ranch hand travels to Hollywood to retrieve his beloved horse, encountering numerous celebrities along the way.

filmography.title: Boys' Night Out
filmography.role_description: A sociology student researching suburban male behavior who poses as a 'kept woman' for a group of friends.
filmography.plot: Four friends rent an apartment for a 'boys' night out' and hire a woman they believe is a mistress, unaware she is studying them.

filmography.title: The Notorious Landlady
filmography.role_description: An American woman in London suspected of murdering her husband, who rents a room to a diplomat.
filmography.plot: An American diplomat rents a flat in London from a beautiful woman who is suspected of killing her missing husband.

filmography.title: Of Human Bondage
filmography.role_description: A vulgar, manipulative waitress who torments a club-footed medical student in this adaptation of the Maugham novel.
filmography.plot: A medical student becomes obsessively enamored with a low-class waitress who repeatedly rejects and abuses him.
filmography.awards: Berlin Int'l Film Festival: Nomination – Golden Bear

filmography.title: Kiss Me, Stupid
filmography.role_description: A waitress and prostitute hired to pose as a songwriter's wife in a scheme to sell a song to Dean Martin.
filmography.plot: A jealous piano teacher hires a prostitute to pose as his wife to sell a song to a famous singer, leading to a farce of mistaken identities.

filmography.title: The Amorous Adventures of Moll Flanders
filmography.role_description: An 18th-century servant girl who uses her beauty and wits to climb the social ladder through a series of marriages.
filmography.plot: A period comedy following the romantic escapades of a woman who strives to improve her social standing in 18th-century England.

filmography.title: The Legend of Lylah Clare
filmography.role_description: A dual role as a legendary dead actress and the young unknown hired to portray her, who becomes possessed by her spirit.
filmography.plot: A director grooms a young actress to play his late wife in a biopic, but she begins to take on the dead woman's persona.

filmography.title: The Great Bank Robbery
filmography.role_description: A member of a fake religious order planning a bank heist, who poses as a pious sister.
filmography.plot: Zero Mostel and Kim Novak pose as a preacher and a sister to rob a bank in the Old West.

filmography.title: Tales That Witness Madness
filmography.role_description: A literary agent who unknowingly invites a cannibalistic ritual into her home in the 'Luau' segment of this horror anthology.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist tells four tales of horror involving his patients to a colleague.

filmography.title: The Third Girl from the Left
filmography.role_description: An aging chorus girl who realizes her career is ending and her boyfriend isn't going to marry her.
filmography.plot: A veteran showgirl re-evaluates her life and relationships as she faces the end of her dancing career.

filmography.title: The White Buffalo
filmography.role_description: An old flame of Wild Bill Hickok who runs a gambling hall and aids him in his hunt for a mythical beast.
filmography.plot: Wild Bill Hickok and Crazy Horse team up to hunt a legendary white buffalo that haunts their nightmares.

filmography.title: Just a Gigolo
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow in post-WWI Berlin who becomes a client of the gigolo protagonist.
filmography.plot: A Prussian war veteran returns to Berlin after WWI and drifts into work as a gigolo in a brothel run by a baroness.

filmography.title: The Mirror Crack'd
filmography.role_description: A fading movie star and rival to Elizabeth Taylor's character, engaging in a bitchy feud on the set of a new film.
filmography.plot: Miss Marple investigates a poisoning at a reception hosted by a famous movie star in a quiet English village.

filmography.title: The Children
filmography.role_description: A woman who rekindles a romance with an old flame amidst a group of children they befriend.
filmography.plot: A man and woman renew their acquaintance and love for each other through their relationship with a group of children.

filmography.title: Liebestraum
filmography.role_description: A dying woman with a dark secret from her past who is visited by the son she gave up for adoption; Novak's final film.
filmography.plot: A writer visits his dying biological mother and uncovers a dark mystery involving a murder that took place decades ago.
